dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform

Class DefaultParameterDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.DefaultParameterDescription

  • public class DefaultParameterDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a parameter that is used to instantiate a widget.

    This class allows to map a WidgetModelElement to type and value for a parameter that is used as parameter to the function that instantiates a widget via the WidgetFactory.

    This class allows to map all Java simple types boolean, byte, char, short, int, long, float, double as well as enums and classes for which the call to the constructor is described via a list of DefaultParameterDescription. For all types also the array variant is supported.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a

    • Method Detail

      • doGetMethodParameterType

        public java.lang.Class<?> doGetMethodParameterType()
        Get the parameter type that is defined in the method parameters.

        Defaults to the class given in the constructor.

        Returns:
        The method parameter type (normally equals doGetParameterType(WidgetModelElement).
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetActualMethodParameterType

        public java.lang.Class<?> doGetActualMethodParameterType()
        Gets the actual parameter type that is defined in the method parameters by stripping the array modifier if necessary.

        Defaults to the Class.getComponentType() of the class returned by doGetMethodParameterType().

        This method can be overridden if a sub-class of the type given as parameter type to the create method should be instantiated.

        Returns:
        The actual type
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetParameterType

        public java.lang.Class<?> doGetParameterType(WidgetModelElement element)
        Query the actual type of the parameter.

        Defaults to the class given in the constructor.

        This method can be overridden if a sub-class of the type given as parameter type to the create method should be instantiated.

        Parameters:
        element - The XML model element that provides the data
        Returns:
        The type (never null)
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetActualParameterType

        public java.lang.Class<?> doGetActualParameterType(WidgetModelElement element)
        Gets the actual type of the parameter stripping the array modifier if necessary.

        Defaults to the Class.getComponentType() of the class returned by doGetParameterType(WidgetModelElement).

        This method can be overridden if a sub-class of the type given as parameter type to the create method should be instantiated.

        Parameters:
        element - The XML model element that provides the data
        Returns:
        The actual type
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetDefaultValues

        public java.lang.String[] doGetDefaultValues(WidgetModelElement element)
        Return or calculate the default values to use.

        Defaults are only used for simple types or enums.

        Parameters:
        element - The element to query default for
        Returns:
        The defaults or null if there are none
        Since:
        2009.a

        Returns:
